remarks: A standard version of Axiom of Infinity, expanded to primitives, derived from our version of Infinity ~ ax-inf and Regularity ~ ax-reg . This theorem should not be referenced in any proof.  Instead, use ~ ax-inf2 below so that the ordinary uses of Regularity can be more easily identified.  (New usage is discouraged.)  (Contributed by NM, 3-Nov-1996.)
statement:
axinf2 $p |- E. x ( E. y ( y e. x /\ A. z -. z e. y ) /\ A. y ( y e. x -> E. z ( z e. x /\ A. w ( w e. z <-> ( w e. y \/ w = y ) ) ) ) ) $.
$d w x y z $.
